Welcome to ASteCA's documentation
==================================

This is the manual of operation for the ``ASteCA`` (**A**utomated **ST**ellar
**C**luster **A**nylysis) packag. The latest version
available for this documentation can be found `here`_.

   :maxdepth: 3

   running
   synth_clust
     imf_sample
